message: Anyone have thoughts on how to farm out GPU / CPU tasks to large numbers of nodes with little to no cost in a legal manner?
little to no cost? Nope, but EC2 has GPU instances now.
Another thought is the C++ extensions in chrome, when that happens.
Back in the day you could use this: http://www.distributed.net/Main_Page
No idea if it's still around
My thought was to do SETI but instead have creative commons pictures of kittens and puppies flowing in.
Right your own SETI and ask people to donate?
